overview: Starting his new job as an instructor at a New England school for the deaf, James Leeds meets Sarah Norman, a young deaf woman who works at the school as a member of the custodial staff. In spite of Sarah's withdrawn emotional state, a romance slowly develops between the pair.
tagline: Love has a language all of its own.
cast: William Hurt|Marlee Matlin|Piper Laurie|Philip Bosco|Allison Gompf
